author: abcoathup
content:
**Questions from a newbie trial Editor**

Should this ERC be ERC6731 (closed PR) or ERC6732? https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6732

<@267831837240328192>:
Why doesn't it have a c-new label?
ERC6734 (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6735) & ERC6735 (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6735) had their c-new labels removed.  I assume because they were both trying to use 00000 as a default ERC number?

<@642887713246150666> can I get access to post in Eth Cat Herders Discord eip-editors channel as a trial editor.  Is ECH Discord the better place to ask newbie questions?

author: poojaranjan
content:
> Is ECH Discord the better place to ask newbie questions?

It should be fine.

> can I get access to post in Eth Cat Herders Discord eip-editors channel as a trial editor.

Everyone who has the access to read  eip-editors channel on ECH Discord has the access write on as well. If that's not the case, and you aren't allowed to write, let me know.

author: pandapip1
content: Not sure about the labeling. I'll investigate.

author: pandapip1
content: For the EIP numbering, it's at your discretion.
